ComicInfo.Title: The Destiny Game. Part Two of Two.; A Revolution in Oz, Chapter Ten: Enough Rope
ComicInfo.AlternateSeries: A Revolution in Oz, The Destiny Game
ComicInfo.Summary: Is this story set in future times or our distant past? One of Bigby and Snow's cubs recounts a misadventure between a certain Wolf Lord, a swindled sorcerer and a beautiful, green-skinned lady named Lake. Plus: Bufkin and Lily's adventures continue!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 02:22:25. [CVDB369074] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:25:30. [Issue ID 1034740]
ComicInfo.Characters: Ambrose Wolf,Nome King,Merlin,Flanders,Hangy the Rope,World Turtle,Lady of the Lake,Lachesis,Bigby Wolf,Magus Atlantes,Snow White,Atropos,Clotho,King Arthur
ComicInfo.Locations: Emerald City,New York State,Homelands,North America,Camelot,Oz,The Farm
